Chapter 6 Opporunities 6.1 Fellowship and Grant opportunities Here is a list of fellowships/grants to which lab members may apply. You can always talk to me about help developing a grant proposal to fund your lab research! Fellowship for students Presidential Graduate Research Fellowships NM will nominate students for this. USDA NIFA Predoctoral Fellowship Available to US citizens. NSF Graduate Research Fellowship Program Available to US citizen graduate students in their first or second year without a Master. The deadline is typically early October. Provides 3 years of funding with an annual stipend. Fellowship opportunities for postdoc NSF Postdoctoral Research Fellowships Available to US citizens. USDA NIFA Postdoctoral Fellowship Available to US citizens. HFSP fellowship Grant opportunities USDA NIFA SARE: There is a grant for Graduate students. NationalGeographic Level I and Level II grants National Pest Management Association ESA (Entomological Society of America) offers many grants and awards.
